sentences.sContent: Yoga has become the new aerobics and some people are getting it out of a book or video.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yoga has become the new aerobics and some people are getting it out of a book or video.
sentences.sCn: 瑜珈已经成为一种新型有氧运动，有些人从书本或录像中学习瑜珈。

sentences.sContent: She teaches swimming, lifesaving and water aerobics.
sentences.sContent_eng: She teaches swimming, lifesaving and water aerobics.
sentences.sCn: 她教授游泳、救生术和水中有氧运动。

remMethod.val: aero(空气) + b + ics(…活动) → 有氧运动

trans.tranOther: a very active type of physical exercise done to music, usually in a class
